Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage claimed a five-wicket haul with the scalp of Kuldeep Yadav
Washington Sundar smashed Jeffrey Vandersay for a six
Jeffrey Vandersay got his first and dismissed Riyan Parag
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka beat India by 110 runs to clinch the series 2-0
Others: India started strong with Rohit Sharma hitting important boundaries but crumbled against Sri Lankan spinners
A dismal batting performance by the Indian batters throughout this series
A disappointing start to India's preparations for Champions Trophy
